page.title: 05MR.TURK'S DONKEYS & PONIES.
page.content: If you come to{Broad Town}when you come down the hill you will often see some donkeys & ponies grazing. They are{Mr.Turk's.}He has had them all his life like his{family}before him. He buys them & sells them. In the{1930's}they came round the village with horses & carts & brought round{meat}&{milk}&{coal.}Horses & carts were very popular.In 1930 there were only{3 cars}in the village & only the richest people had them.When he was younger he said that they let schools & churches have{donkeys}for fetes. He still lets his donkeys & ponies out for our{school fayre}& the church fete.Mr.Turk lives in the big grey house opposite the{village hall.}The date on his house's chimney stack is {1627.
